22221225213755.Text: Ajira now wants samples of four types of flowers: Gold Kanet, Stoneflower Petals, Willow Anther, and Heather. These are found on the shores of Lake Amaya. I should go south out of Balmora and head east past the Fort Moonmoth and across the Foyada Mamaea on the road to Pelagiad. After leaving the Foyada, I should take the road to Suran which runs along the north shore of Lake Amaya.

23438236271459620107.Text: Ajira thanked me for bringing her the four flowers.

26334225243271631374.Text: Mages Guild: Four Types of Flowers
